original: lokātīta namas tubhyaṃ viviktajñānavedine /
analyzed: loka atīta namaḥ tubhyam vivikta jñāna vedine

original: yas tvaṃ jagaddhitāyaiva khinnaḥ karuṇayā ciram // NagLok_01
analyzed: yaḥ tvam jagat hitāya eva khinnaḥ karuṇayā ciram

original: skandhamātravinirmukto na sattvo 'stīti te matam /
analyzed: skandha mātra vinirmuktaḥ na te matam

original: sattvārthaṃ ca paraṃ khedam agamas tvaṃ mahāmune // NagLok_02
analyzed: sattva artham ca param khedam agamaḥ tvam mahā mune

original: te 'pi skandhās tvayā dhīman dhīmadbhyaḥ saṃprakāśitāḥ /
analyzed: te pi skandhāḥ tvayā dhīman dhīmadbhyaḥ saṃprakāśitāḥ

original: māyāmarīcigandharvanagarasvapnasaṃnibhāḥ // NagLok_03
analyzed: māyā marīci gandharvanagara svapna saṃnibhāḥ

original: hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ tadabhāvān na santi ye /
analyzed: hetutaḥ saṃbhavaḥ yeṣām tad abhāvāt na santi ye

original: kathaṃ nāma na te spaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamā matāḥ // NagLok_04
analyzed: katham nāma na te spaṣṭam pratibimba samāḥ matāḥ

original: bhūtāny acakṣurgrāhyāṇi tanmayaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ katham /
analyzed: bhūtāni a cakṣuḥ grāhyāṇi tanmayam cākṣuṣam katham

original: rūpaṃ tvayaivaṃ bruvatā rūpagrāho nivāritaḥ // NagLok_05
analyzed: rūpam tvayā evam bruvatā rūpa grāhaḥ nivāritaḥ

original: vedanīyaṃ vinā nāsti vedanāto nirātmikā /
analyzed: vedanīyam vinā nā asti vedanā atas nirātmikā

original: tac ca vedyaṃ svabhāvena nāstīty abhimataṃ tava // NagLok_06
analyzed: tat ca vedyam svabhāvena nā asti iti abhimatam tava

original: saṃjñārthayor ananyatve mukhaṃ dahyeta vahninā /
analyzed: saṃjñā arthayoḥ ananya tve mukham dahyeta vahninā

original: anyatve 'dhigamābhāvas tvayoktaṃ bhūtavādinā // NagLok_07
analyzed: anyatve dhigama abhāvaḥ tvayā uktam bhūtavādinā

original: kartā svatantraḥ karmāpi tvayoktaṃ vyavahārataḥ /
analyzed: kartā svatantraḥ karma api tvayā uktam vyavahārataḥ

original: parasparāpekṣikī tu siddhis te 'bhimatānayoḥ // NagLok_08
analyzed: paraspara āpekṣikī tu siddhiḥ te bhimatā anayoḥ

original: na kartāsti na bhoktāsti puṇyāpuṇyaṃ pratītyajam /
analyzed: na kartā asti na bhoktā asti puṇya apuṇyam pratītya ajam

original: yat pratītya na taj jātaṃ proktaṃ vācaspate tvayā // NagLok_09
analyzed: yat pratītya na tat jātam proktam vācaspate tvayā

original: ajñāyamānaṃ na jñeyaṃ vijñānaṃ tad vinā na ca /
analyzed: a jñāyamānam na jñeyam vijñānam tat vinā na ca

original: tasmāt svabhāvato na sto jñānajñeye tvam ūcivān // NagLok_10
analyzed: tasmāt svabhāvataḥ na staḥ jñāna jñeye tvam ūcivān

original: lakṣyāl lakṣaṇam anyac cet syāt tal lakṣyam alakṣaṇam /
analyzed: lakṣyāt lakṣaṇam anyat ced syāt tat lakṣyam alakṣaṇam

original: tayor abhāvo 'nanyatve vispaṣṭaṃ kathitaṃ tvayā // NagLok_11
analyzed: tayoḥ abhāvaḥ na anyatve vispaṣṭam kathitam tvayā

original: lakṣyalakṣaṇanirmuktaṃ vāgudāhāravarjitam /
analyzed: lakṣya lakṣaṇa nirmuktam vāc udāhāra varjitam

original: śāntaṃ jagad idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavatā jñānacakṣuṣā // NagLok_12
analyzed: śāntam jagat idam dṛṣṭam bhavatā jñānacakṣuṣā

original: na sann utpadyate bhāvo nāpy asan sadasan na ca /
analyzed: na san utpadyate bhāvaḥ na api asan sat asat na ca

original: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ jāyate katham // NagLok_13
analyzed: na svatas nā api paratas na dvābhyām jāyate katham

original: na sataḥ sthitiyuktasya vināśa upapadyate /
analyzed: na sataḥ sthiti yuktasya vināśaḥ upapadyate

original: nāsato 'śvaviṣāṇena samasya śamatā katham // NagLok_14
analyzed: śva viṣāṇena samasya śamatā katham

original: bhāvān nārthāntaraṃ nāśo nāpy anarthāntaraṃ matam /
analyzed: bhāvāt na artha antaram nāśaḥ nā api anartha antaram matam

original: arthāntare bhaven nityo nāpy anarthāntare bhavet // NagLok_15
analyzed: artha antare bhavet nityaḥ na api anartha antare bhavet

original: ekatve na hi bhāvasya vināśa upapadyate /
analyzed: eka tve na hi bhāvasya vināśaḥ upapadyate

original: pṛthaktve na hi bhāvasya vināśa upapadyate // NagLok_16
analyzed: pṛthaktve na hi bhāvasya vināśaḥ upapadyate

original: vinaṣṭāt kāraṇāt tāvat kāryotpattir na yujyate /
analyzed: vinaṣṭāt kāraṇāt tāvat kārya utpattiḥ na yujyate

original: na cāvinaṣṭāt svapnena tulyotpattir matā tava // NagLok_17
analyzed: na ca avinaṣṭāt svapnena tulya utpattiḥ matā tava

original: na niruddhān nāniruddhād bījād aṅkurasaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: na niruddhāt na aniruddhāt bījāt aṅkura saṃbhavaḥ

original: māyotpādavad utpādaḥ sarva eva tvayocyate // NagLok_18
analyzed: māyā utpāda vat utpādaḥ sarvaḥ eva tvayā ucyate

original: atas tvayā jagad idaṃ parikalpasamudbhavam /
analyzed: atas tvayā jagat idam parikalpa samudbhavam

original: parijñātam asadbhūtam anutpannam na naśyati // NagLok_19
analyzed: parijñātam asadbhūtam anutpannam na naśyati

original: nityasya saṃsṛtir nāsti naivānityasya saṃsṛtiḥ /
analyzed: nityasya saṃsṛtiḥ na asti na eva anityasya saṃsṛtiḥ

original: svapnavat saṃsṛtiḥ proktā tvayā tattvavidāṃ vara // NagLok_20
analyzed: svapna vat saṃsṛtiḥ proktā tvayā tattva vidām vara

original: svayaṃkṛtaṃ parakṛtaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṛtam ahetukam /
analyzed: svayaṃkṛtam para kṛtam dvābhyām kṛtam ahetukam

original: tārkikair iṣyate duḥkhaṃ tvayā tūktaṃ pratītyajam // NagLok_21
analyzed: tārkikaiḥ iṣyate duḥkham tvayā tu uktam pratītya jam

original: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā /
analyzed: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā sā eva te matā

original: bhāvaḥ svatantro nāstīti siṃhanādas tavātulaḥ // NagLok_22
analyzed: bhāvaḥ svatantraḥ nā asti iti siṃhanādaḥ tava atulaḥ

original: sarvasaṃkalpanāśāya śūnyatāmṛtadeśanā /
analyzed: sarva saṃkalpa nāśāya śūnyatā amṛta deśanā

original: yasya tasyām api grāhas tvayāsāv avasāditaḥ // NagLok_23
analyzed: yasya tasyām api grāhaḥ tvayā asau avasāditaḥ

original: nirīhā vaśikāḥ śūnyā māyāvat pratyayodbhavāḥ /
analyzed: nirīhāḥ vaśikāḥ śūnyāḥ māyā vat pratyaya udbhavāḥ

original: sarvadharmās tvayā nātha niḥsvabhāvāḥ prakāśitāḥ // NagLok_24
analyzed: sarva dharmāḥ tvayā nātha niḥsvabhāvāḥ prakāśitāḥ

original: na tvayotpāditaṃ kiṃ cin na ca kiṃ cin nirodhitam /
analyzed: na tvayā utpāditam kim cit na ca kim cit nirodhitam

original: yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt tathatāṃ buddhavān asi // NagLok_25
analyzed: yathā pūrvam tathā paścāt tathatām buddhavān asi

original: āryair nisevitām enām anāgamya hi bhāvanām /
analyzed: āryaiḥ nisevitām enām an āgamya hi bhāvanām

original: nānimittam hi vijñānaṃ bhavatīha kathaṃ cana // NagLok_26
analyzed: na animittam hi vijñānam bhavati iha katham cana

original: animittam anāgamya mokṣo nāsti tvam uktavān /
analyzed: animittam an āgamya mokṣaḥ na asti tvam uktavān

original: atas tvayā mahāyāne tat sākalyena deśitam // NagLok_27
analyzed: atas tvayā mahāyāne tat sākalyena deśitam

original: yad avāptaṃ mayā puṇyaṃ stutvā tvāṃ stutibhājanam /
analyzed: yat avāptam mayā puṇyam stutvā tvām stuti bhājanam

original: nimittabandhanāpetaṃ bhūyāt tenākhilaṃ yagat // NagLok_28
analyzed: nimitta bandhana apetam bhūyāt tena akhilam
iti lokātītastavaḥ samāptaḥ
